1: %%%===================================================================
    2: %%% @copyright (C) 2012, Erlang Solutions Ltd.
    3: %%% @doc Suite for testing s2s connection
    4: %%% @end
    5: %%%===================================================================
    6: 
    7: -module(s2s_SUITE).
    8: -compile(export_all).
    9: 
   10: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   11: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   12: 
   13: -record(s2s_opts, {
   14:           node1_s2s_certfile = undefined,
   15:           node1_s2s_use_starttls = undefined,
   16:           node2_s2s_certfile = undefined,
   17:           node2_s2s_use_starttls = undefined
   18:          }).
   19: 
   20: 
   21: %%%===================================================================
   22: %%% Suite configuration
   23: %%%===================================================================
   24: 
   25: all() ->
   26:     [
   27:      {group, both_plain},
   28:      {group, both_tls_optional}, %% default MongooseIM config
   29:      {group, both_tls_required},
   30: 
   31:      {group, node1_tls_optional_node2_tls_required},
   32:      {group, node1_tls_required_node2_tls_optional},
   33: 
   34:      {group, node1_tls_required_trusted_node2_tls_optional},
   35: 
   36:      {group, node1_tls_false_node2_tls_optional},
   37:      {group, node1_tls_optional_node2_tls_false},
   38: 
   39:      {group, node1_tls_false_node2_tls_required},
   40:      {group, node1_tls_required_node2_tls_false}
   41: 
   42:     ].
   43: 
   44: groups() ->
   45:     [{both_plain, [sequence], all_tests()},
   46:      {both_tls_optional, [], essentials()},
   47:      {both_tls_required, [], essentials()},
   48: 
   49:      {node1_tls_optional_node2_tls_required, [], essentials()},
   50:      {node1_tls_required_node2_tls_optional, [], essentials()},
   51: 
   52:      {node1_tls_required_trusted_node2_tls_optional, [], essentials()},
   53: 
   54:      {node1_tls_false_node2_tls_optional, [], essentials()},
   55:      {node1_tls_optional_node2_tls_false, [], essentials()},
   56: 
   57:      {node1_tls_false_node2_tls_required, [], negative()},
   58:      {node1_tls_required_node2_tls_false, [], negative()}
   59:     ].
   60: 
   61: essentials() ->
   62:     [simple_message].
   63: 
   64: all_tests() ->
   65:     essentials() ++ [nonexistent_user, unknown_domain].
   66: 
   67: negative() ->
   68:     [timeout_waiting_for_message].
   69: 
   70: suite() ->
   71:     escalus:suite().
   72: 
   73: %%%===================================================================
   74: %%% Init & teardown
   75: %%%===================================================================
   76: 
   77: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   78:     Node1S2SCertfile = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, get_local_option, [s2s_certfile]),
   79:     Node1S2SUseStartTLS = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, get_local_option, [s2s_use_starttls]),
   80: 
   81:     node2_rpccall(mongoose_cover_helper, start, [[ejabberd]]),
   82: 
   83:     Node2S2SCertfile = node2_rpccall(ejabberd_config, get_local_option, [s2s_certfile]),
   84:     Node2S2SUseStartTLS = node2_rpccall(ejabberd_config, get_local_option, [s2s_use_starttls]),
   85:     S2S = #s2s_opts{node1_s2s_certfile = Node1S2SCertfile,
   86:                     node1_s2s_use_starttls = Node1S2SUseStartTLS,
   87:                     node2_s2s_certfile = Node2S2SCertfile,
   88:                     node2_s2s_use_starttls = Node2S2SUseStartTLS},
   89: 
   90:     Config1 = [{s2s_opts, S2S} | escalus:init_per_suite(Config0)],
   91:     escalus_users:create_users(Config1, {by_name, [alice2, bob2, alice, bob]}).
   92: 
   93: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   94:     S2SOrig = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
   95:     configure_s2s(S2SOrig),
   96:     node2_rpccall(mongoose_cover_helper, analyze, []),
   97:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}),
   98:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   99: 
  100: init_per_group(both_plain, Config) ->
  101:     configure_s2s(#s2s_opts{}),
  102:     Config;
  103: init_per_group(both_tls_optional, Config) ->
  104:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config), %The initial config assumes that both nodes are configured to use encrypted s2s
  105:     configure_s2s(S2S),
  106:     Config;
  107: init_per_group(both_tls_required, Config) ->
  108:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  109:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_use_starttls = required,
  110:                                node2_s2s_use_starttls = required}),
  111:     Config;
  112: init_per_group(node1_tls_optional_node2_tls_required, Config) ->
  113:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  114:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node2_s2s_use_starttls = required}),
  115:     Config;
  116: init_per_group(node1_tls_required_node2_tls_optional, Config) ->
  117:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  118:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_use_starttls = required}),
  119:     Config;
  120: init_per_group(node1_tls_required_trusted_node2_tls_optional, Config) ->
  121:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  122:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_use_starttls = required_trusted}),
  123:     Config;
  124: init_per_group(node1_tls_false_node2_tls_optional, Config) ->
  125:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  126:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_use_starttls = false}),
  127:     Config;
  128: init_per_group(node1_tls_optional_node2_tls_false, Config) ->
  129:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  130:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node2_s2s_use_starttls = false}),
  131:     Config;
  132: init_per_group(node1_tls_false_node2_tls_required, Config) ->
  133:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  134:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_use_starttls = false,
  135:                                node2_s2s_use_starttls = required}),
  136:     Config;
  137: init_per_group(node1_tls_required_node2_tls_false, Config) ->
  138:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  139:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_use_starttls = required,
  140:                                node2_s2s_use_starttls = false}),
  141:     Config;
  142: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  143:     Config.
  144: 
  145: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
  146:     ok.
  147: 
  148: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  149:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  150: 
  151: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  152:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  153: 
  154: %%%===================================================================
  155: %%% Server-to-server communication test
  156: %%%===================================================================
  157: 
  158: simple_message(Config) ->
  159:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice2, 1}, {alice, 1}], fun(Alice2, Alice1) ->
  160: 
  161:         %% Alice@localhost1 sends message to Alice@localhost2
  162:         escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice2, <<"Hi, foreign Alice!">>)),
  163: 
  164:         %% Alice@localhost2 receives message from Alice@localhost1
  165:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice2, 10000),
  166:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi, foreign Alice!">>], Stanza),
  167: 
  168:         %% Alice@localhost2 sends message to Alice@localhost1
  169:         escalus:send(Alice2, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice1, <<"Nice to meet you!">>)),
  170: 
  171:         %% Alice@localhost1 receives message from Alice@localhost2
  172:         Stanza2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1, 10000),
  173:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Nice to meet you!">>], Stanza2)
  174: 
  175:     end).
  176: 
  177: timeout_waiting_for_message(Config) ->
  178:     try
  179:         simple_message(Config),
  180:         ct:fail("got message but shouldn't")
  181:     catch
  182:         error:timeout_when_waiting_for_stanza ->
  183:             ok
  184:     end.
  185: 
  186: nonexistent_user(Config) ->
  187:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {alice2, 1}], fun(Alice1, Alice2) ->
  188: 
  189:         %% Alice@localhost1 sends message to Xyz@localhost2
  190:         RemoteServer = escalus_client:server(Alice2),
  191:         Fake = <<"xyz@", RemoteServer/binary>>,
  192:         escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Fake,
  193:                                                     <<"Hello, nonexistent!">>)),
  194: 
  195:         %% Alice@localhost1 receives stanza error: service-unavailable
  196:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
  197:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"service-unavailable">>], Stanza)
  198: 
  199:     end).
  200: 
  201: unknown_domain(Config) ->
  202:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice1) ->
  203: 
  204:         %% Alice@localhost1 sends message to Xyz@localhost3
  205:         escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:chat_to(
  206:             <<"xyz@somebogushost">>,
  207:             <<"Hello, unreachable!">>)),
  208: 
  209:         %% Alice@localhost1 receives stanza error: remote-server-not-found
  210:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1, 10000),
  211:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"remote-server-not-found">>], Stanza)
  212: 
  213:     end).
  214: 
  215: nonascii_addr(Config) ->
  216:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob2, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  217: 
  218:         %% Bob@localhost2 sends message to Alice@localhost1
  219:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Cześć Alice!">>)),
  220: 
  221:         %% Alice@localhost1 receives message from Bob@localhost2
  222:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 10000),
  223:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Cześć Alice!">>], Stanza),
  224: 
  225:         %% Alice@localhost1 sends message to Bob@localhost2
  226:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Miło Cię poznać">>)),
  227: 
  228:         %% Bob@localhost2 receives message from Alice@localhost1
  229:         Stanza2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob, 10000),
  230:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Miło Cię poznać">>], Stanza2)
  231: 
  232:     end).
  233: 
  234: node2_rpccall(Module, Function, Args) ->
  235:     Node = ct:get_config(ejabberd2_node),
  236:     rpc:call(Node, Module, Function, Args).
  237: 
  238: configure_s2s(#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_certfile = Certfile1,
  239:                         node1_s2s_use_starttls = StartTLS1,
  240:                         node2_s2s_certfile = Certfile2,
  241:                         node2_s2s_use_starttls = StartTLS2}) ->
  242:     configure_s2s(ct:get_config(ejabberd_node), Certfile1, StartTLS1),
  243:     configure_s2s(ct:get_config(ejabberd2_node), Certfile2, StartTLS2),
  244:     restart_s2s().
  245: 
  246: configure_s2s(Node, Certfile, StartTLS) ->
  247:     rpc:call(Node, ejabberd_config, add_local_option, [s2s_certfile, Certfile]),
  248:     rpc:call(Node, ejabberd_config, add_local_option, [s2s_use_starttls, StartTLS]).
  249: 
  250: restart_s2s() ->
  251:     restart_s2s(ct:get_config(ejabberd_node)),
  252:     restart_s2s(ct:get_config(ejabberd2_node)).
  253: 
  254: 
  255: restart_s2s(Node) ->
  256:     Children = rpc:call(Node, supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_s2s_out_sup]),
  257:     [rpc:call(Node, ejabberd_s2s_out, stop_connection, [Pid]) ||
  258:      {_, Pid, _, _} <- Children],
  259: 
  260:     ChildrenIn = rpc:call(Node, supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_s2s_in_sup]),
  261:     [rpc:call(Node, erlang, exit, [Pid, kill]) ||
  262:      {_, Pid, _, _} <- ChildrenIn].
  263:
